content.original: Battle Computers are Modular Pieces that can be added to a Targeting Computer FCS, greatly enhancing the Combat capabilities of any Mech it is installed on.
content.prevOriginal: Battle Computers are Modular Pieces that can be added to a Targeting Computer FCS, greatly enhancing the Combat capabilities of any Mech it is installed on.
content.content: 作战电脑是模块化部件,可以添加到瞄准电脑火控系统中,大大增加安装该模块的机甲的作战能力.
